name: Devil's Revenge (CloudTech)
description:
Young player, you have found yourself at the final boss; go forth and slay the dev- wait what? You're only level 4? But- the boss was designed for at least a level 16!

In this endless first-person shooter boss level, Use your starting revolver to chip away at the big bad devil's health(although it never reaches zero).  Death is inevitable, get the closest you can to destroying the boss before impending doom.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Mouse to look

Left Mouse Button to shoot, hold for automatic

Encounters:

Imps- ground based enemies that are weak and nimble

Eye sores- Stationary flying turrets that deal major damage if you let them charge up

Laser storms- Move over Lightning, these laser clouds patrol aimlessly and slowly, but they'll do serious damage if it touches you

"El rock"- Look up! "El rock" trembles silently before crashing down, if you are not paying attention it can take out half your health in one strike!

Tools:

Unity, Blender, Photoshop, Bosca Ceoil, and SFXR
